eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Dodge, WI; at 08:14 AM ON JAN 26, 2026 Effective until 04:14 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: MISSING ENDANGERED: JERAMIE HURLEY 40 YEAR OLD MALE WHITE 5'08" 160 POUNDS WEARING JEANS, TAN CARHARDT JACKET, BLACK BOOTS - LAST KNOWN TO BE ON FOOT FROM AREA OF COUNTY RD G AND COUNTY RD S IN TOWN OF BEAVER DAM, IF SEEN DO NOT APPROACH, ADVISE DODGE COUNTY SHERIFF OFFICE 9 1 1 OR 920-386-3726 EXT 8
